Manchester United must sign Gareth Bale AND Antoine Griezmann, claims Red Devils great Rio Ferdinand The former England centre-back believes Jose Mourinho has the money to acquire both superstars this summer Share Rio Ferdinand believes Man United should sign both Gareth Bale and Antoine Griezmann (Photo: Real Madrid/AFP/Getty/BT Sport) Share Get Manchester United FC     
Manchester United should sign both Gareth Bale and Antoine Griezmann this summer, claims Rio Ferdinand. 
The Real Madrid and Atletico superstars have been linked with moves to Old Trafford. 
Jose Mourinho brought in Paul Pogba last summer in a world record £89million deal and Ferdinand believes United could splash out a similar amount for both Bale and Griezmann. 
“Manchester United have got the money, I’d go get both,” Ferdinand told Squawka. “They’re great players but I don’t think they’re comparable to be honest. They’re different players. Ferdinand believes Griezmann and Bale could both move to Old Trafford this summer (Photo: Angel Martinez) Read More 
“Gareth could play anywhere across the front-line. He’d be effective anywhere – from the right to the left, central.” 
“If they became available, Manchester United have to be in that.” 
With Zlatan Ibrahimovic remaining for another season, Mourinho would have to adjust his formation to include both the Swede and Griezmann in his best position. poll loading Will Antoine Griezmann AND Gareth Bale join Manchester United? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
